instructions.title: SURFACE PREPARATION
instructions.data: Surface to be painted should be clean and dry, free from dust, dirt, and other foreign matter. Hammer all nails deep enough to apply BOYSEN®® Lacquer Spot Putty B‑306. Sand surface until wood is smooth to the touch. Dust off surfaces completely then wipe with a clean rag.

instructions.title: PAINTING SCHEDULE
instructions.data: 1st coat: BOYSEN®® Lacquer Primer Surfacer B‑305 Putty: BOYSEN®® Lacquer Spot Putty B‑306 2nd coat: BOYSEN®® Lacquer Primer Surfacer B‑305 (on puttied areas) Final coats (in required number of coats): BOYSEN®® Automotive Lacquer B‑1300

instructions.title: NOTES
instructions.data: Use only BOYSEN®® Lacquer Thinner B‑50 as thinning solvent. If necessary, add approximately 10% by volume of BOYSEN®® Lacquer Flo B‑1205 to the ready-to-use topcoat mixture.

calculator.title: Sealer
calculator.item: BOYSEN®® Lacquer Primer Surfacer B‑305

calculator.title: Putty (Full)
calculator.item: BOYSEN®® Lacquer Spot Putty B‑306
